search.combineTerms: Combine terms with AND, OR, NOT
search.example1: Example: 'mold*' finds all items starting with 'mold'
search.example2: Example: 'active AND type:A' finds active items of type A
search.example3: Example: 'date:2024-01-01..2024-12-31' finds items in date range
